entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
